name: amen24
description: Amen24 is a free non-profitable project to introduce bible content for all.

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/**/node_modules packages/**/node_modules apps/**/dist apps/**/.next packages/**/dist
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:packages && npm run install:apps
scripts.install:packages: npm --prefix packages/shared install && npm --prefix packages/ui install
scripts.install:apps: npm --prefix apps/admin install && npm --prefix apps/frontend install && npm --prefix apps/backend install
scripts.build:packages: npm --prefix packages/shared run build && npm --prefix packages/ui run build
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix apps/frontend run build && npm --prefix apps/admin run build
scripts.build:frontend:test: npm --prefix apps/frontend run build:test && npm --prefix apps/admin run build:test
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,admin -c blue,green,yellow "npm --prefix apps/backend run start:dev" "npm --prefix apps/frontend run dev" "npm --prefix apps/admin run dev"

author: emadunan
